summary:
ETHERMIND - Stable Money of the leverage on crypto-native assets using ZAI at low interest rates.

 ZAI (USDz) - ZAI (USDz) is highly scalable decentralized and over-collateralized stablecoin that can be used to leverage against crypto-native assets.

 ZAI offers instant liquidity - ZAI offers instant liquidity to allow users to leverage on crypto-native assets like LRTs, LSDs, BTC Derivatives, DeFi tokens etc...

 MAHA - Governance, Incentives and Security is handled by MAHA. The incentive token of the ecosystem.
